Hopsized Brewing Co. in Bonita Springs, FL | Craft Brewery in Florida Skip to content Home About Us Our Story On Tap Weekly Happenings FAQ Visit Reservations Home About Us Our Story On Tap Weekly Happenings FAQ Visit Reservations Facebook Instagram Your hoppy third space bonita springs, fl See what's on tap Crafting A future For better communities Hopsized Brewing Co. blends the evolutionary scope of art and science to deliver high-quality and passionately crafted brews for all beer lovers to enjoy. Our warm and welcoming family-friendly third space will host many special events like our monthly ‚ÄòNight Market at The Springs‚Äô, Latin Night, and much, much more! UPCOMING EVENTS Weekly Releases We release newly curated beers every Thursday! From traditional lagers, Nebulous IPA and APAs, stouts, K√∂lsch‚Äôs, and fruited sours, we have something for everyone! Subscribe and follow us on Untappd and social media for weekly beer release updates. host your next private event From birthday parties, rehearsal dinners, weddings, to work and networking functions, click below to book the brewery for your next event. reservations events See What's Happening From Yoga to our Run Club to Trivia Nights we always have something happening! Check out what's coming up at Hopsized. Events About Us Meet the Team Learn more about the awesome people that make great beer and memorable experiences! ABOUT US brewery Learn More From water-to-glass, all our beers are brewed on our 3.5 bbl Ss Brewtech electric brewhouse. Each beer is curated to be made to style using our reverse-osmosis (RO) water system.  Using advanced technology like our Plaato Pro‚Äôs, to our dry-hop induction system, we strive to produce only highly quality beers for our community and out-of-State visitors to enjoy year-round! brewery 9201 COCKLESHELL CT, UNIT 13 BONITA SPRINGS 239-317-2287 reservations Facebook Instagram "best small brewery in florida - 2023" hours Monday: Closed Tues ‚Äì Thurs: 3pm ‚Äì 9pm Friday: 3pm ‚Äì 10pm Saturday: 12pm ‚Äì 10pm Sunday: 12pm ‚Äì 5pm links on tap events about us faq don't miss out Join the list to learn about special events & beer releases! Hopsized Brewing Co. Skip to content Home About Us Our Story On Tap Weekly Happenings FAQ Visit Reservations Home About Us Our Story On Tap Weekly Happenings FAQ Visit Reservations Facebook Instagram about us learn more our story Hopsized Brewing Co. started off like most craft-breweries: homebrewing in a garage! Originally from Miami, Florida, co-founders Ana and Darlyn (a.k.a Vic) relocated to Fort Myers in 2016. Vic began homebrewing May of 2019, following suggestions from Ana, given his growing love for craft beers at the time, especially NEIPAs. A few months later, they were off to winning awards at local homebrewing competitions. Vic continued to expand his knowledge for brewing, applying his background in science each step of the way, from learning water chemistry, recipe creation, hop utilization, blending, survivables, the importance of pH, and healthy yeast management. It wasn‚Äôt long before their entrepreneurial drive led them to formulate a business plan. A little over 2.5 years later, Hopsized Brewing Co. opened its doors in beautiful Bonita Springs, Florida. meet our crew the hopsized brew crew Michael King a.k.a Mike From: Sarasota, Florida Favorite Beers: Wild Ales and NEIPAs Favorite Beer at Hopsized: Postcard Fun Fact: I graduated from UF Hobbies: Basketball, Vinyl, Bowling, Traveling, Howard Stern Patric John a.k.a Pat From: South Fort Myers Favorite Beers: NEIPAs and Coconut Coffee Porters Favorite Beer at Hopsized: Elusive Juice w/ Phantasm Fun Fact: I love old-school classical music Hobbies: Playing guitar, everything sports related, and being a dog dad Kaitlyn Rodulph a.k.a Kait From: Port Orange, Florida Favorite Beers: Reds and NEIPAs Favorite Beer at Hopsized: Sl√°inte Fun Fact: I love outer space and wanted to be an astronaut when I ‚Äúgrew up‚Äù Hobbies: cooking, telling jokes, traveling, playing the ukulele, anything outdoors Sydney Sakalosky a.k.a Syd From: Omaha, NE Favorite Beers: Sours Favorite Beer at Hopsized: Berry Potion or Poison Ivy Fun Fact: I'm a huge true crime junkie Hobbies: Hiking, reading, writing poetry, lifting, traveling Brittany Axelson a.k.a Britt From: Clearwater, Florida Favorite Beers: Dark Lagers and Sours Favorite Beer at Hopsized: Sl√°inte and Poison Ivy Fun Fact: I live in a tiny house (yes like the ones you see in HGTV) Hobbies: Wood working, gardening, 3D printing, home brewing plan your visit Find out our brewery hours, get answers to frequently asked questions and discover our broad selection of beers on tap. learn more 9201 COCKLESHELL CT, UNIT 13 BONITA SPRINGS 239-317-2287 reservations Facebook Instagram "best small brewery in florida - 2023" hours Monday: Closed Tues ‚Äì Thurs: 3pm ‚Äì 9pm Friday: 3pm ‚Äì 10pm Saturday: 12pm ‚Äì 10pm Sunday: 12pm ‚Äì 5pm links on tap events about us faq don't miss out Join the list to learn about special events & beer releases!
